class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required. Technology required: webcam and microphone.
course_description: This course examines various areas of norm violations and rule-breaking behaviors. Students will learn how norms vary across time, culture, and society by looking at how norms are socially constructed.
prerequisites: SOC_OX 101 or SOC 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
